title: A Big Job at a Tech Company
summary: Meta, the company that owns Facebook, has given a new important job to Dina Powell McCormick. She is now the president and vice chairman. This means she will help lead the company and make big decisions. Dina has worked for two U.S. presidents, including Donald Trump, and has a lot of experience in finance. She used to work at Goldman Sachs and was on Meta's board before. Donald Trump said this was a great choice. Mark Zuckerberg, Meta's CEO, thinks her skills will help the company grow. Dina is married to a senator named David McCormick. This news shows how people from government and finance can work in tech companies.
